biotools.summary:
Analysis Tools for EM Connectomics.

Query and View plugins used by the neuPrintExplorer site to generate reusable query forms and visualisations.

Implements a connectomics REST interface that leverages the neuprint data model. neuPrintHTTP can be run in a user authenticated mode or without any authentication. Note: that the authenticated mode (which requires more configuration and setup) is needed to use with neuPrintExplorer web application. The un-authenticated mode is the ideal way to access the neuPrint data programmatically.

Python client utilties for interacting with the neuPrint connectome analysis service.

exploring inter and intra cellular interactions.

Query plugins generate a form to take user input and query the neuPrint cypher api to fetch data from the server.
